info.title: Procurement-Related Task
info.description: This service enables you to create, update and delete procurement-related tasks through an API call.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update and delete procurement-related tasks using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Returns the list of activity references
get.description: Returns the list of activity references for a procurement-related task

post.description: Sends new task from activity manager to processor

parameters.name: SuplrActyTaskUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.description: Submits task and sends it from processor back to activity manager

parameters.name: SuplrActyTaskUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.summary: Sets status of task to completed
post.description: Sets status of task to completed as final status

parameters.name: SuplrActyTaskUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.description: Requests clarification for task and sends it from activity manager back to processor

parameters.name: SuplrActyTaskUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_SuplrActyTskActyReference HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

skip.name: $skip
